sentences.sentence: How will you get to your office at Mega Giga Industries on time?
sentences.translation: 你怎样才能按时赶到米嘉-技嘉公司上班呢？

sentences.sentence: GIGA provides tools for designers to identify and use green materials.
sentences.translation: GIGA所提供的设计工具能够使他们辨认和使用绿色环保材料。

sentences.sentence: When tested in the Giga Ethernet environment, the system can work steadily.
sentences.translation: 经过实际测试，系统能稳定地工作在千兆以太网的网络环境。
